note.p: Bookseller and publisher. Son of Thomas Henry Hall, hat maker, and his wife Maria of Finsbury, London. Apprentice hat maker, 1841. Bookseller in Lambeth, Surrey, 1851, 1861, 1871; at 72 Stamford Street, Lambeth, 1871, 1881. A widower living on private means, 1881. Living with his son, Gilbert, in Islington, London, 1891, 1901.
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1936 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG4/4674; Ancestry.com, accessed 17 November 2021)
